title: PlayStation 5 Reveal Kinda Funny Live Reactions
description:
Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, Blessing Adeoye, and Andy Cortez react live to the PS5 Future of Gaming reveal event.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
0:00 - Intro
3:20 - Show start
5:35 - GTA V
9:15 - Spider-Man Miles Morales
10:25 - Gran Turismo 7
13:33 - Ratchet & Clank Rift Apart
19:10 - Project Athia
20:25 - Stray
22:10 - PS5 system stats/specs stuff
24:06 - Returnal
26:24 - Sackboy A Big Adventure
28:42 - Destruction Allstars
30:38 - Kena
33:17 - Goodbye Volcano High
34:55 - Oddworld Soulstorm
36:57 - Ghostwire Tokyo
39:30 - Jett
41:50 - Godfall
43:20 - Solar Ash
45:05 - Hitman 3
47:40 - Astro's Playroom
48:50 - Little Devil Inside
51:05 - NBA 2K21
52:27 - Bugsnax
54:40 - Demon's Souls
57:10 - Deathloop
1:01:17 - Resident Evil Village
1:04:25 - Pragmata
1:07:00 - Horizon Forbidden West
1:10:48 - Hype video + Console reveal + show end

Shout-out to Michael Benacquista for the timestamps!



Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy 
Andy - http://www.twitter.com/MaximumCortez 
Kevin - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
